baseline_texts: The image shows a hand holding a small blue plastic cup filled with a white liquid, likely milk or yogurt. The background features a tiled corner of a room with a red and white floral patterned cloth or blanket spread out on the floor. The lighting is bright, suggesting it might have been taken with a flash.

This frame shows a corner of a room with a floor mat or rug spread out. The mat has a design featuring large floral patterns in light blue and brownish-red colors. The walls and floor are plain with a muted grayish tone. There is an out-of-focus light-colored object with some blue on it in the lower right portion of the image, which appears to be moving or held close to the camera.

This frame shows a close-up of a hand releasing or tossing a small blue object into the air or across the floor. The background features a floor with a patterned orange and cream-colored rug that has floral designs. The setting appears to be indoors, near a corner where the floor meets the walls.

This frame shows a hand about to roll or throw a small blue ball on a patterned carpet. The carpet has floral designs in white and brown or rust color. The scene takes place indoors, near the corner of a room with light-colored walls and a baseboard. The blue ball appears to be in mid-motion or about to be released from the hand.

The image shows a corner of a room with a tiled floor and plain walls. There is a brown and beige patterned rug with floral designs spread out on the floor. Near the edge of the rug, a person's hand is visible extended into the frame from the right side, holding a small delicate blue feather. The setting appears to be indoors with typical household flooring and baseboards.

The frame shows a corner of a room with a tiled floor and plain walls. On the floor, there is a patterned red and beige carpet featuring floral designs. A small blue bottle cap is placed on the carpet near the corner. On the right side of the frame, a person's hand is visible, positioned as if ready to pick up or interact with the bottle cap. The lighting suggests that the scene is indoors with artificial light.

The frame shows a portion of a room with a tiled floor and a wall with a baseboard. On the floor, there is a patterned carpet or mat with a design featuring large white flowers and green leaves on a reddish-brown background. Near the center of the frame, resting on the carpet, is a small blue bottle cap. On the right side of the image, a hand with an open palm is visible, extended toward the bottle cap. The hand appears to be in the foreground, emphasizing the focus on the bottle cap. The overall setting looks like an indoor space with simple decor.

This frame shows a section of a room with light-colored tiled flooring and white walls. There is a reddish-brown patterned rug with light blue floral designs laid on the floor. On the rug, there is a small blue cap or bottle lid. On the right side of the frame, a hand is extended towards the rug, appearing to reach out or pointing at something on the floor. The setting appears simple and uncluttered.
diff_texts: Initial frame. No previous frame to compare.
The blue cup, previously held steady, is now moving rapidly causing a blur effect in the current frame. The hand holding the cup is also blurred due to this motion.

In the current frame, the blue object is no longer in the hand and is seen moving away, appearing blurred and airborne. The hand has shifted to the right side of the frame and is open as if having just released the blue object.
In the current frame, the blue object has moved slightly downward and to the left, while the hand has opened more compared to the previous frame.
The blue object moved from near the bottom center of the frame to a position closer to the bottom left on the patterned rug. The hand remains in a similar position.
The blue bottle cap has moved from being held above the carpet to resting on the carpet.

The hand, which was initially open with fingers close together, has now moved slightly closer to the camera and appears more spread out in this frame. The blue bottle cap on the carpet remains in the same position. No other significant changes in the main objects are observed.
The hand has moved slightly closer to the blue bottle cap on the mat.
